metadata.title: CVE-2013-6052 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - low
metadata.description:
OpenJPEG 1.3 and earlier allows remote attackers to obtain sensitiveinformation via unspecified vectors that trigger a heap-based out-of-boundsread.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2013-6052` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libopenjpeg2 - 1.3+dfsg-4.7ubuntu1
openjpeg-tools - 1.3+dfsg-4.7ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: openjpeg package in trusty, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.3+dfsg-4.7ubuntu1').
